item.title: Release notes from kotlin: build-1.5.0-dev-1225
item.content:encoded: No content.

item.title: Release notes from ggplot2: ggplot2 3.3.3
item.content:encoded:
This is a small patch release mainly intended to address changes in R and CRAN.
It further changes the licensing model of ggplot2 to an MIT license.

  • Update the ggplot2 licence to an MIT license (#4231, #4232, #4233, and #4281)
  • Use vdiffr conditionally so ggplot2 can be tested on systems without vdiffr
  • Update tests to work with the new all.equal() defaults in R >4.0.3

item.title: Release notes from cube.js: v0.25.11
item.content:encoded:
0.25.11 (2021-01-04)

Bug Fixes

  • cubestore: File not found if upstream mounted as a network volume (68822ec)
  • cubestore: Fix write metastore locking (cbbacce)
  • cubestore: Handle corrupted log files and discard them with error (00a1c1a)
  • cubestore: Handle corrupted upstream metastore (d547677)
  • cubestore: Index repairs (d5dc4cf)
  • cubestore: Set default worker pool timeout to 2 minutes (139c8f6)
  • Declare Add missing externalQueueOptions for QueryCacheOptions (563fcdc)

Features

  • cubestore: Rebase arrow to 2020-01-02 version (3cbb46d)
  • cubestore: Three tables join support (b776398)

item.title: Release notes from ant-design: 4.10.0
item.content:encoded:
üéâ Happy New Year!

  • üêû Fix the compatibility issue of less 4.0.0.
  • üêû Fix the problem of cursor jumping when Typography is editable. #28545
  • üêû Fix the problem that repeatedly clicking on expanded nodes when Tree dynamically loads data will lead to wrong status.#28349 @liuchao233
  • üêû Fix the problem that TreeSelect & Select cannot open the dropdown menu when it's searchValue has value. #28574
  • üêû Fix Dropdown disabled menu item link style. #28578
  • üêû Fix Progress steps display accuracy issue. #28530 @gaoryrt
  • üêû Fix Radio align issue in Chrome. #28616
  • üêû Fix Collapse arrow position not aligned when change @collapse-header-padding variable. #28507
  • üíÑ Optimize the white border style of Card images. #28624
  • Input
    • üêû Fix TextArea value get cut when input chinese words. #28456
    • üÜï The showCount property of Input.TextArea now supports passing in a method to customize the display format of the number. #28145 @MrHeer
    • üÜï Input focus supports configuring the cursor position when getting focus. #28602
  • Modal
    • üÜï Modal.method adds an afterClose callback that will be triggered after the Modal is completely closed. #28053 @liuchao233
    • üêû Fix the problem that Modal can be dragged outside the viewport. #28438 @mumiao
  • Table
    • üêû Fix the problem that Table childrenColumnName and checkStrictly={false} cannot be used together. #28568
    • üêû Fix Table selection abnormal behavior when inside Checkbox.Group. #28576
    • üêû Fix the problem that the sticky header style is messy when there is no data. #28323
    • üêû Fix the problem that onChange listener always receives empty list as filters parameter if use a custom filterDropdown. #28627 @Meowu
    • üÜï Adds expandable.columnWidth to customize the width of the expanded column. #28249
    • üÜï Adds clear all option from selection. #28580 @n0ruSh
  • Image
    • üêû Fix the misalignment issue of Image component.#28439 @MoeCasts
    • üíÑ Adds preview style. #28235
    • üÜï Adds functionality for zoom in\out by sliding the wheel. #react-component/image/52 @OmriGM
    • üÜï Support separate settings url for preview images. #react-component/image/56 @wangcch
  • Upload
    • üêû Fix a warning even when not using transformFile. #28455 @YanYuanFE
    • üêû Fix Upload fileList cannot work with data that is produced by immer. #28636 @mumiao
    • üÜï Upload adds a new maxCount property to limit the number of files. #28367
  • DatePicker
    • üöÄ Optimize the logic of disabledDate. #react-component/picker/191
    • üÜï Adds onKeyDown callback. #react-component/picker/138 @conquera99
  • Select
    • üêû Fix issue where options update does not trigger the selection box content update. #react-component/select/580 @jameslahm
    • üêû Fix the problem that the dropdown box cannot be opened after clicking the option with tagRender. react-component/select/582 @mumiao
    • üêû Fix the problem that tokenSeparators can not recognize the separator correctly under Chinese input method. #28564
    • üÜï Adds scrollTo to the ref. #react-component/select/565
    • üÜï maxTagCount supports responsive in multiple mode. #28520
  • üÜï Slider add a new range.draggableTrack prop. #28592
  • üÜï Descriptions support setting labelStyle & contentStyle directly. #28613
  • üÜï message added a new onClick callback that will be triggered when the message is clicked. #28148 @ZeroTo0ne
  • üÜï The scrollToFirstError property of the Form adds support for setting the position for scrolling. #28272 @vouis
  • üÜï Steps support reponsive which allows to turn off reponsive change. #28459
  • üåê Localization
    • üá≠üá∑ Improved Croatian language support. #28458
  • TypeScript
    • ‚öíÔ∏è Fix title type of PageHeader. #28374 @zhukovvandrei

üéâ Êñ∞Âπ¥Âø´‰πêÔºÅ

  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç‰∏çÂÖºÂÆπ less 4.0.0 ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Typography ÂèØÁºñËæëÊÄÅÂÖâÊ†áË∑≥Âä®ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28545
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Tree Âä®ÊÄÅÂä†ËΩΩÊï∞ÊçÆÊó∂ÈáçÂ§çÁÇπÂáªÂ±ïÂºÄËäÇÁÇπ‰ºöÂØºËá¥Áä∂ÊÄÅÈîôËØØÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28349 @liuchao233
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç TreeSelect & Select searchValue Âú®ÂèóÊéß‰∏îÊúâÂÄºÊó∂Ôºå‰∏ãÊãâËèúÂçïÊó†Ê≥ïÊâìÂºÄÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28574
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Dropdown Á¶ÅÁî®ËèúÂçïÈ°πÂÜÖÁöÑÈìæÊé•Ê†∑Âºè„ÄÇ#28578
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Progress steps ÊòæÁ§∫Á≤æÂ∫¶ÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28530 @gaoryrt
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Radio Âú® Chrome ‰∏ãÁöÑÂØπÈΩêÊ†∑ÂºèÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28616

    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Input.TextArea Êúâ maxLength Êó∂ËæìÂÖ•‰∏≠ÊñáË¢´Êà™Êñ≠ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28456

    • üÜï Input focus ÊîØÊåÅÈÖçÁΩÆËé∑ÂèñÁÑ¶ÁÇπÊó∂ÁöÑÂÖâÊ†á‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ#28602
  • Modal
    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Modal ÂèØ‰ª•Ë¢´ÊãñÊãΩÂà∞Á™óÂè£Â§ñÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28438 @mumiao
    • üÜï Modal.method Êñ∞Â¢û afterClose ÂõûË∞ÉÔºå‰ºöÂú® Modal ÂÆåÂÖ®ÂÖ≥Èó≠ÂêéËß¶Âèë„ÄÇ#28053 @liuchao233
  • Table
    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç childrenColumnName Âíå checkStrictly={false} Êó†Ê≥ï‰∏ÄËµ∑‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28568
    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Checkbox.Group ÂÜÖÈÄâÊã©Ë°å‰∏∫ÂºÇÂ∏∏ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28576

    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§çËá™ÂÆö‰πâ filterDropdown Êó∂ onChange ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁöÑ filters ÂèÇÊï∞ÊÄªÊòØÊé•Êî∂Á©∫Êï∞ÁªÑÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28627 @Meowu
    • üÜï Êñ∞Â¢û expandable.columnWidth ‰ª•Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÂ±ïÂºÄÂàóÁöÑÂÆΩÂ∫¶„ÄÇ#28249
    • üÜï ÈÄâÊã©È°πÊñ∞Â¢ûÊ∏ÖÁ©∫ÊâÄÊúâÈÄâÈ°π„ÄÇ#28580 @n0ruSh
  • Image
    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§çÈîô‰ΩçÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28439 @MoeCasts
    • üíÑ Ê∑ªÂä†È¢ÑËßàÊ†∑Âºè„ÄÇ#28235
    • üÜï ÊîØÊåÅ‰ΩøÁî®Èº†Ê†áÊªöËΩÆÁº©ÊîæÂõæÁâá„ÄÇ#react-component/image/52 @OmriGM

    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç‰∏ç‰ΩøÁî® transformFile Êó∂‰πü‰ºöÊúâË≠¶ÂëäÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#28455 @YanYuanFE

item.title: Release notes from aws-cdk: v1.82.0
item.content:encoded:
‚ö† BREAKING CHANGES TO EXPERIMENTAL FEATURES

  • eks: Existing self managed nodes may loose the ability to host additional services of type LoadBalancer . See #12269 (comment) for possible mitigations.

Bug Fixes

  • eks: Self managed nodes cannot be added to LoadBalancers created via the LoadBalancer service type (#12269) (470a881)
  • lambda-layer-*: unable to calculate layer asset hash due to missing file (#12293) (646f098), closes #12291

item.title: Release notes from neovim: NVIM v0.5.0-dev+1000-g84d08358b
item.content:encoded:
Nvim development (prerelease) build

NVIM v0.5.0-dev+1000-g84d08358b
Build type: RelWithDebInfo
LuaJIT 2.1.0-beta3

Install

Windows

  1. Extract nvim-win64.zip (or nvim-win32.zip)
  2. Run nvim-qt.exe

macOS

  1. Download nvim-macos.tar.gz
  2. Extract: tar xzvf nvim-macos.tar.gz
  3. Run ./nvim-osx64/bin/nvim

Linux (x64)

  1. Download nvim.appimage
  2. Run chmod u+x nvim.appimage && ./nvim.appimage
    • If your system does not have FUSE you can extract the appimage: 
      ./nvim.appimage --appimage-extract
./squashfs-root/usr/bin/nvim

Other

  • Install by package manager

item.title: Release notes from rxdb: 9.12.0
item.content:encoded:
Features:

  • Allow primary and ref at the same time in a schema. #2747

Bugfixes:

  • #2705 when use bulkInsert to insert doc, the rxDocument property on changeEvent is an object, not a RxDocument instance. Thanks @qinyang912
  • When the mutation function of atomicUpdate() has thrown once, it was not possible to use it again.

item.title: Release notes from alacritty: Alacritty Version 0.7.0 Release Candidate 1
item.content:encoded:
Added

  • Support for ~/ at the beginning of configuration file imports
  • New cursor.style.blinking option to set the default blinking state
  • New cursor.blink_interval option to configure the blinking frequency
  • Support for cursor blinking escapes (CSI ? 12 h, CSI ? 12 l and CSI Ps SP q)
  • IME support on Windows
  • Urgency support on Windows
  • Customizable keybindings for search
  • History for search mode, bound to ^P/^N/Up/Down by default
  • Default binding to cancel search on Ctrl+C
  • History position indicator for search and vi mode

Changed

  • Nonexistent config imports are ignored instead of raising an error
  • Value for disabling logging with config.log_level is Off instead of None
  • Missing glyph symbols are no longer drawn for zerowidth characters

Fixed

  • Wide characters sometimes being cut off
  • Preserve vi mode across terminal reset
  • Escapes CSI Ps b and CSI Ps Z with large parameters locking up Alacritty
  • Dimming colors which use the indexed CSI 38 : 5 : Ps m notation
  • Slow rendering performance with a lot of cells with underline/strikeout attributes
  • Performance of scrolling regions with offset from the bottom
  • Extra mouse buttons are no longer ignored on Wayland
  • Numpad arrow keys are now properly recognized on Wayland
  • Compilation when targetting aarch64-apple-darwin
  • Window not being completely opaque on Windows
  • Window being always on top during alt-tab on Windows
  • Cursor position not reported to apps when mouse is moved with button held outside of window
  • No live config update when starting Alacritty with a broken configuration file
  • PTY not drained to the end with the --hold flag enabled
  • High CPU usage on BSD with live config reload enabled
  • Alacritty not discarding invalid escape sequences starting with ESC
  • Crash due to clipboard not being properly released on Wayland
  • Shadow artifacts when resizing transparent windows on macOS
  • Missing glyph symbols not being rendered for missing glyphs on macOS and Windows
  • Underline cursor being obscured by underline
  • Cursor not being rendered with a lot of unicode glyphs visible
  • IME input swallowed after triggering a key binding
  • Crash on Wayland due to non-standard fontconfig configuration
  • Search without vi mode not jumping properly between all matches

Removed

  • The following CLI arguments have been removed in favor of the --option flag:
    • --persistent-logging
    • --live-config-reload
    • --no-live-config-reload
    • --dimensions
    • --position
  • live-shader-reload feature
  • Config option dynamic_title, you should use window.dynamic_title instead
  • Config option scrolling.faux_multiplier, which was replaced by escape CSI ? 1007 h/l
  • WinPTY support on Windows

Core Changes

  • chore: remove old traces of next/data experiment: #20678

item.title: Release notes from eslint: v7.17.0
item.content:encoded:
• e128e77 Update: check logical assignment in no-constant-condition (#13946) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • cc48713 Chore: refactor calculating range and loc in no-useless-escape (#13964) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 535fe47 Update: use regexpp's default ecmaVersion in no-control-regex (#13969) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 83e98cd Fix: use regexpp's default ecmaVersion in no-invalid-regexp (#13968) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 7297363 Docs: fix examples for no-multi-str (#13966) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 0649871 Update: add autofix to rule multiline-ternary (#13958) (ËñõÂÆöË∞îÁöÑÁå´)
  • f6e7e32 Fix: no-useless-escape wrong loc and fix with CRLF in template elements (#13953) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 19c69c0 Fix: one-var shouldn't split declaration if it isn't in a statement list (#13959) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • e451b96 Docs: update build tool for webpack (#13962) (Sam Chen)

item.title: Release notes from svelte: v3.31.1
item.content:encoded: version 3.31.1

item.title: Release notes from next.js: v10.0.5-canary.7
item.content:encoded:
Core Changes

  • Ensure href is updated for locale domain: #20631
  • fix(experimental scroll): use sessionStorage instead of history: #20633
  • Add isReady field on router: #20628
  • fix(overlay): skip disable & upgrade platform: #20647
  • Fix react-dev-overlay rem style conflict: #17723
  • fix(next/image): do not pass-through srcSrc on lazy image: #20651
  • Ensure all entries are cleared from cache on runtime change: #20652
  • Update error when internal href and external as are used: #20658
  • fix(source map): correctly generate source maps: #20672

Documentation Changes

  • Add docs on authentication patterns.: #16277
  • Update docs for basePath: false rewrite: #20663

Example Changes

  • Update Next.js in mongoose example: #20644
  • example with-mdbreact: #19879
  • Fix withSourceMaps is not a function: #20643
  • Update to Tailwind CSS 2.0 in blog-starter-typescript example: #20664

Credits

Huge thanks to @leerob, @Timer, @ciruz, @enochndika, @zimv, @lharries, and @JstnEdr for helping!

item.title: Release notes from ava: 3.15.0
item.content:encoded:
Automatic snapshot file removal

When you stop using snapshots in a test file, the next time you run ava --update-snapshots we'll remove the left-over snapshot files. Thanks @ninevra! 4f093ab

TAP improvements

@tymfear has been on a roll improving our TAP reporter. t.log() output is now compliant with the spec 99ab93a. Tests that did not run due to timeouts are now reported 98595da.

Next-generation configuration

AVA 4 will add full support for ESM configuration files as well as allowing you to have asynchronous factory functions a2f2614. If you're using Node.js 12 or later you can opt-in to these features in AVA 3 by enabling the nextGenConfig experiment. Say in an ava.config.mjs file:

export default {
	nonSemVerExperiments: {
		nextGenConfig: true
	},
	files: ['unit-tests/**/*]
};

This also allows you to pass an .mjs file using the --config argument.

With this experiment enabled, AVA will no longer have special treatment for ava.config.js files. Instead AVA follows Node.js' behavior, so if you've set "type": "module" you must use ESM, and otherwise you must use CommonJS.

You mustn't have an ava.config.mjs file next to an ava.config.js or ava.config.cjs file.

See v3.14.0...v3.15.0 for all changes.
